pages.text: Can do the following: $(li)Bulk blasting (lava) $(li)Bulk smoking (fire) $(li)Bulk washing (water) $(br)Notice: Any items incompatible with bulk blasting will be deleted.

Notice: Faster RPM does not equate to faster processing. $(br2)Instead, it is the quantity of fans focused on the same block. You can have 4 fans facing a single block horizontally and have 2 fans vertically, just make sure they are blowing towards the block and not pulling from the block.
